sub_title: Linguistics | Sports Education | Training & Coaching | Copywriting | Translation
summary:
A qualified specialist in the fields of:
• physical education, recreation, and fitness with considerable experience in training people of all age groups, in developing health promotional and remedial training programs, organizing as well as conducting sports events;
• copyrighting and proofreading, with 14 years of experience in writing articles, social media posts, creating advertising and marketing content.
A senior lecturer and a Head of Physical education and sport at Bukovinian State Medical University with a Master’s degree in Physical education. 18 years of experience in teaching the subject of “Physical Education and Health” at one of the three top universities of Ukraine.
Qualified table tennis coach and a holder of a national-level umpire license. Experienced fitness-yoga instructor for individual and group practices; extensive experience in organising fitness and sports events for children and adults. The author of two course books in physical training.
A master's degree in Ukrainian and Russian philology also equipped me with the fundamental skills for analytics and content creation. Additionally, I have passed the English language certification exam APTIS.
Experienced freelance writer, translator, and editor.
